```{r echo=FALSE}
library(leaflet)
library(leafgl)
library(sf)
library(htmlwidgets)
library(leafpop)

n = 1e6

df1 = data.frame(id = 1:n,
                 x = rnorm(n, 10, 3),
                 y = rnorm(n, 49, 1.8))

pts = st_as_sf(df1, coords = c("x", "y"), crs = 4326)

options(viewer = NULL) # view in browser

image = "http://pm1.narvii.com/6906/acc41d149126b07902e9de1a6db6b48c4f7c99f8r1-1136-640v2_00.jpg"

leaflet() %>%
  addGlPoints(data = pts[1:10000,], group = "pts1", src = TRUE,
              popup = paste0("id: ", pts[1:10000,]$id, "<br/>",
                             "image: ",
                             "<img src='http://pm1.narvii.com/6906/acc41d149126b07902e9de1a6db6b48c4f7c99f8r1-1136-640v2_00.jpg'>", "<br/>",
                             "id: ", pts[1:10000,]$id),
              popupOptions(maxWidth = 600)) %>%
  addGlPoints(data = pts[10000:20000,], group = "pts2", src = TRUE,
              popup = "<img src='http://pm1.narvii.com/6906/acc41d149126b07902e9de1a6db6b48c4f7c99f8r1-1136-640v2_00.jpg'>") %>%
  addLayersControl(baseGroups = c("pts1", "pts2"), # baseGroups for one base group (only) at a time
                   options = layersControlOptions(collapsed = FALSE)) %>%
  setView(lng = 10.5, lat = 49.5, zoom = 6)  -> maphtml

saveWidget(maphtml, "2022/webmap/maphtml.html", selfcontained = FALSE)
```
